body.name: VIZIO 32" Class Full HD 1080p Smart LED TV Bluetooth Connectivity Game Mode AMD FreeSync Voice Remote Compatible with Alexa & Google Assistant (No Stands) + Free Wall Mount D32FM-K01 (Renewed)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: Free Wall Mount: Enjoy a better view and angle from your living room or bedroom riding your TV on the wall, giving it a unique style and saving space (No TV Stands)
Full HD Picture Perfection: Full HD Picture Perfection gives you crystal-clear, award-winning picture quality
Free TV Lives Here: Save on cable bills and stream for free with VIZIO WatchFree+. Built-in to every new VIZIO TV, WatchFree+ gives you 250+ live streaming channels and over 5,000 titles on demand
Game On - PC or Console Ready: Get ready for next-gen gaming with AMD FreeSync, ultra-low input lag, VRR to reduce screen tearing, and NEW HDR gaming

Smart Home Ready: Control your TV with your voice using Apple Home, Google Assistant, and Alexa. With built-in Apple Airplay and Chromecast, you can share or mirror anything from your laptop, phone, or tablet directly to your TV
body.description: VIZIO D32FM-K01 is a 32-inch flat-panel display model with Full HD 1080p resolution that offers a sharp and vibrant viewing experience. With a slim and elegant design, this TV is perfect for any room in your home. VIZIO D32FM-K01 features advanced imaging technology that delivers accurate colors and deep contrast for stunning image quality. In addition, it has a 60Hz refresh rate, which ensures that action and sports scenes look blur-free. The Smart TV also comes equipped with two HDMI ports, allowing you to easily connect devices such as Blu-ray players, game consoles, and set-top boxes. It also has a USB port, allowing you to play multimedia content from external devices. VIZIO D32FM-K01 also comes with an easy-to-use remote control that allows quick access to all of your television's features. Additionally, the television is compatible with VIZIO SmartCast, allowing you to stream content from your mobile device directly to the television screen. VIZIO D32FM-K01 is an excellent choice for those looking for impressive image quality in a compact and stylish package. With Full HD resolution, advanced picture technology and easy connectivity, this television offers an immersive viewing experience for any room in your home.
